articles.description: Zombies, mutants, diabolical regimes and serial killers. 2024 is already shaping up to be an excellent year for new TV shows.

articles.title: 100 films to look forward to in 2024 – part one - Little White Lies
articles.description: New year, new movies! We look ahead to the films coming our way in 2024 – including new projects from Bong Joon-ho, George Miller, Rose Glass and many more.
